title: Emmerdale spoilers: Aaron receives devastating news from Robert
text:
Aaron Dingle (Danny Miller) and Robert Sugden (Ryan Hawley) made a rash decision to flee the village several weeks ago in Emmerdale but, their plan ultimately failed, as Robert turned himself in to the police so that Aaron didn’t have to live life on the run. As a result, Aaron has struggled to cope ever since, and matters are made worse in the coming episodes, as he receives a devastating message from Robert.

Upon learning that Lee had died, Robert was unable to process what had happened. However, Liv (Isobel Steele) suggested that both he and Aaron could go on the run together and — after some deliberation — they agreed to do just that.

However, Aaron soon returned to the village — as his escape plan with Robert didn’t quite pan out and Robert ended up handing himself into the police — and in the coming episodes, both Liv and Victoria (Isabel Hodgins) grow concerned about the young man, as they come to believe he might be having a breakdown.

Later Victoria finds Aaron engaging in a fight with Wendy, and thus she proceeds to interrupt them. However, the pair are shocked when she breaks down in tears, and Wendy is rather apologetic as a result. After the dust settles, Victoria does her best to get Aaron to see sense.

However, Chas soon arrives and reveals she’s received a message from Robert — something which leaves everyone thinking that all hope might not be lost after all. That is, until Victoria learns of what Robert’s message entails.

Yes, Robert has made it clear that he doesn’t want any visitors — which means that both Victoria and Aaron won’t be allowed to see Robert again.

She’s devastated for sure, but the question is: how will Aaron react when he hears the news?

description: This news is no doubt going to break Aaron's heart.
